channel.title: CVE Feed for If So Plugin -- If-So Dynamic Content Personalization
channel.description: The latest CVEs for If So Plugin -- If-So Dynamic Content Personalization

item.title: CVE-2023-51492|2024-02-10T08:23:57.000Z -- if%20so%20plugin -- if-so%20dynamic%20content%20personalization
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in If So Plugin If-So Dynamic Content Personalization allows Stored XSS.This issue affects If-So Dynamic Content Personalization: from n/a through 1.6.3.1.
